item.title: 3 ways to help your child retire with $1 million — or more
item.description: One financial strategy claims investing $1,544 for a child at birth can help them retire with $1 million. Could it be that simple?

item.title: Why is IBM’s stock down after an earnings beat? Here’s one quibble.
item.description: The company beat revenue expectations in consulting and infrastructure — but it didn’t deliver upside for its software segment.

item.title: Chipotle says that consumer confidence took a hit in Q2. The stock is sliding.

item.title: ServiceNow CEO warns of ‘extinction’ for some legacy software as stock pops on earnings
item.description: The enterprise-software company beat expectations with its latest earnings and boosted its outlook.

item.title: ‘I’m already up $45,000 in about an hour’ — Reddit traders boast about wins as meme-stock mania returns
